thread.title: iCoo Acrobat Stroller and iGuard35 Infant Car Seat Travel System in Copper Blue
thread.title_full: iCoo Acrobat Stroller and iGuard35 Infant Car Seat Travel System in Copper Blue

title: iCoo Acrobat Stroller and iGuard35 Infant Car Seat Travel System in Copper Blue
text: Icoo Acrobat Stroller and Iguard35 Infant car Seat Travel System in Copper Blue Stroller Originally Posted On: Feed Services   The iCoo Acrobat Travel System offers a sensational ride for baby while making mom and dad look stylish as ever. Attention to detail and trend-setting design set this stroller apart from the rest, resulting in its award for best product and high-quality. This stylish pram mediates a feeling of individuality and freedom, paired with ease of use and a dynamic look. The iCoo Acrobat is a modern accessory on a unique copper frame, which you don't want to miss. The icoo igaurd35 rear-facing infant car seat and the brilliantly, designed icoo acrobat, combines comfort and adaptability with unmatched safety features Features: Suspension system lets you navigate the ground with ease. Weighs 20lbs Handle is height adjustable Front wheels rotate 360 degrees and are lockable Parking brake for child safety Larve sun canopy with unzip section for airation Side reflectors Folds up in seconds Comes with iGuard 35 Infant Car Seat Installation versatility compatible with both 2- and 3-point belt systems Use the included latch
